Name: BullyBall
About the game: It's only about you, bow and infinity. BullyBall is a VR shooting range game, where your only aim is to shot balls and your only tool is a bow. Though balls are smart enough to constantly keep you in tension, so you need a strong arm to reciprocate. Be flexible in your tactics and reach the top of the Leaderboard! Key features: Your thrusted Bow that you can't get rid of Endless Arrows with no reload Enemies have 8 different base behaviors without any limitations of how they can be combined. Discover all the impossible enemies you can think about and can't get through... Endless waves of enemies, which are evolutionary evolving based on how you play , and just a few HP to check if you're ambitious enough to stand against infinity
